name: Disco Undercover
description:
Reece Carver is a police officer who makes his rounds in the year 2375 in New Century City and keeps law and order.

But one day, he loses everything he holds dear in an accident.

Driven by revenge, you play the role of Reece Carver and try to find out how this accident, in which you lost your beloved wife and daughter, could have happened.

Through first clues, you learn that the biggest gang in town, the Endless Dragon Gang, knows more about that accident. So you set out on an undercover operation to infiltrate their headquarters, the Colorful Cube.

 

As a 2D retro pixel top-down dungeon crawler, Disco Undercover contains various rogue-like and puzzle elements as well as turn-based battles. Explore the colorful cube and try to get information. Fight against the gang members of the Endless Dragon Gang and with skill find out what happened to your family.

But be warned: if you are discovered, you will have to go underground and acquire a new identity before you can get back into the club. So every step should be well-thought-out.

 

The Game Disco Undercover is a project work by five students of the SRH University of Applied Sciences, Heidelberg.
